input.sentences: i went to the star wars toy convention this summer !
i got an awesome yoda action figure .
they had a ton of huge action figures | even for sale !

output.sentences: This summer I went to a Start Wars toy convention.
I found an awesome Yoda figure while I was there.
Also on sale was a huge statue of Chewbacca that must have weighed a ton.
After seeing the statue, I went to look see the hundreds of options they had for character figurines.
I am building a massive Star Wars collection.
